title: Ticket #995: Failed submit leaves output, error, and log behind
description:
To reproduce, do the following. Note: do not have a valid X509 proxy. 
% cat > submit
universe=grid
grid_resource=cream https://stress3.chtc.wisc.edu:8443/ce-cream/services/CREAM2 condor stress3.chtc.wisc.edu
executable=/bin/date
output=eraseme.$(Cluster).$(Process).out
error=eraseme.$(Cluster).$(Process).err
log=eraseme.log
notification=never
queue 100
% condor_submit submit
Submitting job(s)
ERROR: can't determine proxy filename
x509 user proxy is required for gt2, gt4, nordugrid or cream jobs
% ls eraseme*
eraseme.108.0.err  eraseme.108.0.out  eraseme.log

I wouldn't expect any of those eraseme.* files to exist. Even more surprising, why are the .0. files present, but not .1. through .99..
remarks:
2009-Nov-25 16:48:28 by adesmet:
Abandoning: Accidental duplicate of #994.
creator: adesmet
